titles.title: Federal Law Enforcement Training Center Protection Act of 2010
A bill to withdraw certain land in the State of New Mexico, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.
Committee on Energy and Natural Resources Subcommittee on National Parks. Hearings held.

committee.name: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources

action.text: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources Subcommittee on Public Lands and Forests. Hearings held.

committee.name: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources

bill.summary: 7/20/2010--Introduced. Federal Law Enforcement Training Center Protection Act of 2010 - Reserves for 20 years certain federal land for use by the Department of Homeland Security (DHS) for the Federal Law Enforcement Training Center in Eddy County, New Mexico.
